title: Nightsatan and the Loops of Doom SD TV-rip .ts sync finsub
description:
Here's a decent TV capture of short film Nightsatan and the Loops of Doom, straight off the Finnish television. This time, I managed to retain the sync and even kept the subtitles, so enjoy this post-apoc psy-italo short film.

The subtitles are in native DVB Subtitle format within the .ts file and also as an external .srt file, in case your player doesn't run them or something.

I have no problems using MPC-HC and MadVR.

Buy the CD+DVD box if you love this flick
